thread.section_title: Comfort Inn Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: so near to everything
thread.title_full: so near to everything - Review of Comfort Inn Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mand1970
title: so near to everything
text:
Arrived at hotel, bit worried at first site,.hotel looked a bit shabby, but walking through doors it was fine.
Hotel reception staff helpful and friendly. Elevator to room on 6th floor no problem.
Room was lovely and big, bathroom was a fair size, bath and shower.
Very clean hotel
Free internet
LOCATION.
Only a short walk 5 or so minutes to time square.
At top of road loads of eating places.
Tour buses go from top of road plus subway is at end of road on corner.
Port Authority bus terminal 5 minute walk away. I picked up shuttle from airport that dropped me here. THEATRES in walking distance. This is a fantastic location at a reasonable price for a hotel.
Breakfast is also included. Great choice. Coffee available all day.
Luggage storage facilities
Would i stay here again. Yes.
Room Tip: request a high floor, See more room tips
